00020 #ifndef H_LOGFILE
00021 #define H_LOGFILE
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <fstream>
00025 
00026 namespace Logging {
00027 
00028 using namespace std;
00029 
00030 class LogFile {
00031 public:
00032     enum LogFileOptions { NORMAL = 0, TIMESTAMP_ON_FILENAME = 1, APPEND = 2 };
00033     LogFile(const string& fileName, LogFileOptions options = NORMAL);
00034     ~LogFile();
00035 
00036     void logPrintf(const char* printfFormat, ...);
00037 
00038 protected:
00039     fstream fs;
00040 };
00041 
00042 #define LOGFILE_OPEN(logFile, name, options) \
00043     logFile = new Logging::LogFile(std::string(RDK_ROOT) + "/logs/" \
00044     + std::string(LOGGING_MODULE) + "-" + name, options)
00045 
00046 #define LOGFILE_CLOSE(logFile) \
00047     delete logFile
00048 
00049 #define LOGFILE_PRINTF(logFile, format, args...) \
00050     { \
00051     logFile->log_printf(format, ## args); \
00052     }
00053 
00054 #define LOGFILE_STREAM(logFile, stream_expr) \
00055     { \
00056     std::ostringstream s; \
00057     s << stream_expr; \
00058     logFile->log_printf(s.str().c_str()); \
00059     }
00060 
00061 #define GLOBALLOG_ENABLE(enable)
00062 
00063 #define GLOBALLOG_OPENFILE
00064 
00065 #define GLOBALLOG_EVENT_BEGIN(eventName)
00066 
00067 #define GLOBALLOG_EVENT_END(eventName)
00068 
00069 #define GLOBALLOG_CLOSEFILE
00070 
00071 } // namespace
00072 
00073 #endif
